description: The emi Airwave infused with anit-static technology is a unique dryer that includes attachments to different looks. The airwave attachment twirls hair into gorgeous lose waves while the concentrator creates smooth straight looks. The dryer also contain ionic ceramic and has 2 heat and 3 speed settings. The 1875 watt dryer has a cool shot which helps you set your style and has a 2 year warranty.
title: Remington D1001 Ceramic Airwave Hair Dryer with Wave Attachment and Anti Static Technology
